p: The levels of both oestrogen ( p < .001) and progesterone ( p < .001) were significantly decreased in the OVX group compared with the control and sham groups (Figure 3C and D). However, the level of oestrogen and progesterone in the treatment groups with OVX‐estradiol and flaxseed oil was significantly increased in comparison with the OVX group ( p < .001).
